title: City, police clear homeless encampments at Toronto's Trinity Bellwoods Park - The Globe and Mail
content:
Scores of police officers moved in as private security guards erected metal fences around two areas of the park where the city says about 20 homeless people had been living in tents.

description: Toronto Raptors guard Jalen Harris has been dismissed and disqualified from the NBA for violating terms of the anti-drug program, the league announced Thursday.
